DOC.brief_summary: To examine relationship psychosocial characteristic , health behavior , development coronary heart disease among participant Framingham Offspring Study .
DOC.brief_title: Framingham Offspring Study : Psychosocial Risk Factors
DOC.detailed_description: DESIGN NARRATIVE : Unique data set social , psychological , behavioral measure collect third examination Offspring Study 1984 1987 ( result 14 17 year follow-up ) . Hypotheses research focus toward understand sex age difference effect variable health endpoint . The research question involve prediction three separate endpoint : incidence coronary heart disease ; incidence prognosis atrial fibrillation ; total mortality . The analysis psychosocial predictor outcomes divide four conceptual area : 1 ) occupational status strain , income , employment status ; 2 ) type A behavior , expression anger , hostility , rate ; 3 ) symptom depression , tension , anxiety , feeling aloneness ; 4 ) marital relationship marital strain . These psychosocial variable analyze jointly physiological risk factor collect time assess independence interaction effect . To date psychosocial data analyze publish . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Protocol Registration Results System ( PRS ) record .
